CONTENTS.WHO_WE_ARE:
We are a company recently in the market founded in an pandemy season when we found the importance of natural products. It aims to spread the benefits that bee products represents in the people's health as well as in the Brazilian fauna and flora. 
The Himawari (sunflower) was built in ethical fundamentals, regarding for quality of your products, respect for the environment and customers, as well as a strict selection in relation to the suppliers of the products. 
Himawari Brasil has two segments, one aimed at the Asian foreign market through exports (Himawari Brasil exports) and the other aimed at product sales at the national level. 
We believe that being beautiful is being healthy! We believe that beauty is synonymous with health.
CONTENTS.MISSION: Be a company that adds product values to consumers.
CONTENTS.VALUES: We value transparency, ethics, proactivity and satisfaction.
